metadata.title: USN-5532-1 -- Bottle vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Bottle incorrectly handled errors during early request  binding. An attacker could possibly use this issue to disclose sensitive  information. (CVE-2022-31799)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5532-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-bottle - 0.12.13-1ubuntu0.2 python-bottle - 0.12.13-1ubuntu0.2 python-bottle-doc - 0.12.13-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
